faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: We answer your questions. Decide with data.

items.question: Does it work for cold traffic?
items.answer: Yes. ADNCreativo generates creatives designed to capture the attention of prospects who don't know you yet. Images and copy designed to stop the scroll and generate clicks from cold traffic campaigns.

items.question: Can I use the creatives in real campaigns?
items.answer: Absolutely. Every creative is generated in the formats and specifications required by Meta Ads, Google, TikTok, LinkedIn and more. Download and publish directly.

items.question: Does it replace a designer or complement one?
items.answer: It complements. ADNCreativo accelerates the production of variants to test, iterate and scale. If you have a designer, it frees their time for strategic tasks. If you don't, it gives you professional creatives in minutes.

items.question: How many creatives can I generate?
items.answer: It depends on your plan. From 50 to 250 creatives per month. Each generation produces variants in multiple formats (4:5, 1:1, 9:16, 3:4) so you can test quickly.

items.question: Is it designed for scaling ads?
items.answer: Exactly. The logic behind ADNCreativo is to give you creative speed to test more angles, more variants and more formats without bottlenecks. More creatives = more data = better decisions.

items.question: Do I need prior advertising experience?
items.answer: No. Just paste your brand or product URL and AI takes care of interpreting your proposition, your identity and the ad objective. Professional results without technical knowledge.
